name: Spherio - v0.25 [UE4]
description:
This is an early prototype of Spherio. Many, many more features to come, including:

-An adventure story following the journey of our hero Spherio to reach the all-knowing Icosahedron.

-Unique Powers/Curses for Spherio

-Levels with physics-based puzzles that can be solved multiple ways.

-More not yet dreamed of?

Created with Unreal Engine 4.
